about_the_game:
The fan favourite is finally playable!


Play through Pancake Patrol as the one and only Cotton Candy Cloud!

The Cotton Candy Cloud is equipped with 2 special passive abilities for a very unique gameplay experience.
Just like it's ability counterpart, it's movement is random, but to make up for this increased challenge, it has boosted stats:

  • HP: 777
  • Speed: 77
  • Armor: 77%
  • Damage: 1.77
  • Weapons: 7
  • Utilities: 7
